hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Decoupling During Stress Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: During market stress events (BTC drawdown >10% in 5 days), meme coins (PEPE, DOGE, TRUMP) will decouple from altcoin index with 30% lower correlation, as retail speculative flows concentrate in highest-narrative assets while institutional altcoins (SOL, AVAX) face deleveraging.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins trade on retail sentiment and viral narratives rather than fundamentals. During stress, retail speculators double down on high-conviction meme bets while institutions/systematic funds reduce beta exposure across altcoins.
entry_conditions: Altcoin index (excluding memes) 5-day correlation to BTC > 0.85
Meme coin sector correlation to BTC drops below 0.65
Social volume ratio (meme/altcoin) spikes > 2.0 standard deviations

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC recovers 50% of drawdown or meme correlation normalizes to >0.75
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Meme coins underperform altcoin index by >15% during stress

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Meme coins show equal or higher correlation to BTC during stress, indicating uniform risk-off across all speculative assets.
